choices.C: It can have positive and negative outcome.
choices.D: It delivers a defined goal under a contract.
choices.E: It creates a new product or service.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACE
A. It is a temporary endeavor.
C. It can have positive and negative outcome.
E. It creates a new product or service.

questions.question_text:
An organization is establishing a project management office (PMO). A senior manager from operations is interested if their team can use a project management approach to manage their work.

Which three are the characteristics of a project? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
software testing approach that simulates real-world user scenarios and workflows to ensure a system functions as expected in its intended environment.

Selected Answer: C
Integration testing is the correct answer because it directly addresses the need to ensure that the solution works correctly when all parts are combined and deployed in the production environment.

questions.question_text:
A project manager is reviewing some techniques that can be used to evaluate solution results. The intent is to evaluate the solution in the larger context to ensure it does not behave in unacceptable ways when deployed to production.

Which evaluation technique should be used here?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Resource management plan: This document outlines how resources (both human and physical) will be identified, acquired, utilized, and managed throughout the project. After onboarding resources, updates to this plan may include new roles filled, changes in resource availability or capacity, and any adjustments to resource allocation strategies.

Cost baseline: The cost baseline is a part of the overall project baseline and represents the authorized budget for the project work. Onboarding resources can impact project costs, such as salaries, contractor fees, or other resource-related expenses. Therefore, updates to the cost baseline may be necessary to reflect these changes.

Preassignment refers to assigning specific resources to project roles BEFORE the project officially begins. Onboarding resources happens after the decision is made to bring them onto the project. This could be considered if it’s “Reassignment”.

questions.question_text: A project manager is in the process of onboarding resources to start work on a project. Which of the following components of a project management plan will the project manager update after completing this activity?

choices.C: Resource management plan and procurement management plan
choices.A: Resource management plan and cost baseline
choices.B: Resource management plan and lessons learned register

questions.question_text: Which statement describes the Monitor Communications process?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Chap. 10.3 Monitor communications. pg. 388
I think A should be the answer - key word being "evaluate" since it's about monitoring. A is broad enough to include the management processes of B & C. Chat GPT also says A.

comments.content:
Correct Answer is A
The Monitor Communications process is part of the Monitoring and Controlling Process Group in Project Communications Management. This process ensures that the information needs of the project and its stakeholders are being met effectively. It involves tracking and reviewing project communications to ensure that the communication plan is being followed and that stakeholders are receiving the necessary information.

Sorry.. I meant B.. as you can see this process ENSURES THAT THE INFORMATION NEEDS OF THE PROJECT AND ITS STAKEHOLDERS ARE MET. Evaluating the differences between the communication plan and the actual communications is what you DO, but the final purpose is not to compare but to ensure

if you push ChatGPT further on this:

The correct answer in the context of the PMBOK Guide for the Monitor Communications process is:

B. Ensures that the information needs of the project and the stakeholders are met.

The Monitor Communications process is primarily concerned with overseeing and ensuring that the information needs of the project and its stakeholders are being addressed. This involves monitoring communication performance, understanding stakeholder communications requirements, and making adjustments to the communication plan as needed to meet those requirements.
You can created collect, and distribute in a timely and appropriate manner that does not mean you are complying with the Communication Plan, just that the communications sent are correct.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Why not C?

Selected Answer: B
B for sure
B. Ensures that the information needs of the project and the stakeholders are met
B-Ensures the information needs of the stakeholders are met-10.3

choices.A: Evaluates the differences between the communications management plan and the reality of communications in a project
choices.D: Develops an appropriate and plan for communication of project activities
choices.B: Ensures that the information needs of the project and the stakeholders are met
choices.C: Ensures that project information is created, collected, and distributed in a timely and appropriate manner

questions.question_text: A business case is being assembled. Which two elements are necessary to complete this process? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Creo en definitiva que son D y E

Selected Answer: DE
A business case primarily focuses on justifying the project’s value and ensuring it aligns with the organization’s strategic objectives. The key elements for this purpose are:

Product roadmap (D): This outlines the future vision and direction for product development, helping stakeholders understand how the project fits into the long-term strategy.
Business goals and objectives (E): These define what the business seeks to achieve through the proposed initiative, providing a clear rationale for the project.
While the Risk register (B) is an important document for identifying and managing potential risks throughout the project lifecycle, it is not typically a core component of the initial business case.

Selected Answer: BE
its B & E According to Chat GPT

Definitely E
